name: BOXVR
description:
BOXVR brings high intensity boxing workouts to your HTC Vive.

We have worked with some of the world’s best fitness class instructors to produce a variety of workouts that are specifically designed to destroy calories.

New workouts will be added regularly.

More features to come, including:

TRAINING MODE - Practice the punch combos in this mode with your own music.

SURVIVAL MODE - Compete with your friends to survive the longest in this non-stop mode.

Proudly brought to you by the team at FITAR
